title: Practice-Based Learning for Inter-Agency Collaboration in Domestic Violence Response

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of domestic violence and foundational knowledge in social welfare
context.additional_context: Customized scenario-based activities reflecting learner roles (healthcare, legal, and technical professionals)

learning_goals: Design inter-agency collaboration processes involving at least three organizations in victim-centered domestic violence cases
Identify at least two potential conflict factors in actual inter-agency collaboration and propose resolution strategies
Write virtual inter-agency meeting minutes using digital collaboration tools (chat/cloud) in a smartphone-based LMS environment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
